thread.title: Bigallen
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Bigallen

author: Bigallen
title: Bigallen
text: Chose this because of the reviews, have another Mira Shower in house and works well, while this one has just been installed time will tell how good it is, was slightly different to the existing one and had to buy some elbows and 15mm pipe to alter but all done in less than 2 hours
